segments.text: I notice the woman’s calm demeanor, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how she can ignore the overflow and the growing mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pooling on the floor looks so uninviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there’s the boy, almost falling off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so anxious for him; one wrong move and he’s down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined to get those cookies, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, with her hand outstretched, is just waiting her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s cute but also reckless in a way; they should know better.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn’t anyone stop them or at least warn them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The normality of the garden outside contrasts sharply with the scene inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
